column1: International Events Management (Work Experience Route) MSc
column5: Learn how to manage a vibrant range of international events, from cultural and sporting occasions to conferences, exhibitions and festivals.
column7: Our tuition fee for UK students starting full-time study in 2024/25 is £10,310 for the course without work experience placement or £11,810 with work experience placement.  Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
